distinct
from CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG
order by ${orderByClause}

update CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_NAME = #{record.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_NAME = #{record.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTTP_ID = #{record.httpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_REQ = #{record.templateReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_RESP = #{record.templateResp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_KEY_ID = #{record.pubKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRI_KEY_ID = #{record.priKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENCRY_FILTER = #{record.encryFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TEST = #{record.isTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG
INTERFACE_NAME = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTTP_ID = #{httpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATE_REQ = #{templateReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATE_RESP = #{templateResp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_KEY_ID = #{pubKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRI_KEY_ID = #{priKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENCRY_FILTER = #{encryFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TEST = #{isTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG set INTERFACE_NAME = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTTP_ID = #{httpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_REQ = #{templateReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_RESP = #{templateResp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_KEY_ID = #{pubKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRI_KEY_ID = #{priKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENCRY_FILTER = #{encryFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TEST = #{isTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ccic.INTERFACE_NAME AS interfaceName, ccic.TEMPLATE_REQ AS templateReq, ccic.TEMPLATE_RESP AS templateResp, ccic.PUB_KEY_ID AS pubKeyId, ccic.PRI_KEY_ID AS priKeyId, ccic.ENCRY_FILTER AS encryFilter, ccic.IS_TEST AS isTest, chc.HTTP_HOST AS httpHost, chc.HTTP_PARAM_ID AS httpParamId, chc.HTTP_METHOD AS httpMethod from CL_CHANNEL_INTERFACE_CONFIG ccic LEFT JOIN CL_HTTP_CONFIG chc on CCIC.HTTP_ID=chc.HTTP_ID where 1=1 and ccic.INTERFACE_NAME=#{interfaceName} AND ccic.DEL_FLAG='1' AND chc.DEL_FLAG='1'
